First time meeting: You don't seem to be corrupted by the arcane powers here.
Nope. It'll take more than a little magic to mess with this old brain of mine.
I figured we'd be seeing someone like you after what happened to the last agent they sent.
Do you know what happened to him?
Some fool here killed him. You'll find his body on the second floor.
Let me impart some of my power to you. There's enough that needs cleaning around here without adding your corpse to the list.
How's that shield working for you? Hopefully it will keep you alive.
